subject: 女神现身废墟，两人对视，情感复杂
detail: 2D Chinese anime style, a goddess descends gracefully onto the ruins of Lingjian Mountain, her serene yet sorrowful face illuminated first by faint starlight, then the starlight shifts to softly highlight the male protagonist's eyes filled with longing and conflict, finally revealing the shattered starry river in the background; the two stand motionless, locked in a charged, emotionally complex gaze—love and resentment intertwined, hearts pounding with unspoken feelings; dim ambient lighting with delicate celestial glow, subtle wind rustling through broken stone and distant cosmic hum; fixed camera framing the poignant confrontation in ultra-high-definition 8K resolution. Background sound: soft wind howling through ancient ruins and muffled, rhythmic heartbeat. Voiceover says in Chinese "爱恨交织，情难自已。"
image_detail: (2D国漫风格)，灵剑山废墟，女神降落，两人对视，背景是残破星河，高清晰度，8K画质
